member.summary: Represents data about the PageChanged event.

member.summary: Gets number of the current page.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ZoomChangedEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: Indicates number of the current page after the ZoomChanged event.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ZoomChangedEventArgs.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Indicates page magnification caused by the ZoomChanged event.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ZoomChangedEventArgs.ZoomType
member.summary: Indicates the type of page magnification caused by the ZoomChanged event.

member.summary: Represents event data about event.

member.summary: Get number of the page where the mouse activity occurred.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityEventArgs.PageX
member.summary: Gets x-coordinate of the point where the mouse activity occurred.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityEventArgs.PageY
member.summary: Gets y-coordinate of the point where the mouse activity occurred.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityEventArgs.SelectionRect
member.summary: Gets area on the page selected by the mouse.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityEventArgs.OriginalEventArgs
member.summary: Gets current mouse event data.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityEventArgs.MouseActivity
member.summary: Gets type of current mouse activity.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle
member.summary: Specifies the standard rotation angles for page rotation in the PDFViewer component.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.Clockwise180
member.summary: Page is rotated 270 degrees in clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.Clockwise90
member.summary: Page is rotated 180 degrees in clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.Zero
member.summary: Page is rotated 90 degrees in clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.AntiClockwise90
member.summary: Page is not rotated.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.AntiClockwise180
member.summary: Page is rotated 90 degrees in counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle.AntiClockwise270
member.summary: Page is rotated 180 degrees in counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.StandardZoomType
member.summary: Defines page magnification options for the PDFViewer component.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.StandardZoomType.ActualSize
member.summary: Page is displayed at its actual size.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.StandardZoomType.FitPage
member.summary: Page's width and height are adjusted to fit the bounds of the viewer's display area.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.StandardZoomType.FitWidth
member.summary: Page's width is adjusted to fit the width of the viewer's display area.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.StandardZoomType.Custom
member.summary: Page is magnified to a custom level.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType
member.summary: Specifies a list of mouse activities happening on a PDF page through PDFViewer component.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType.None
member.summary: No mouse activity on the PDF page.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType.ButtonDown
member.summary: A mouse button was pressed down within a PDF page

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType.ButtonUp
member.summary: A mouse button was released within a PDF page

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType.Moving
member.summary: Mouse movement activity without selection (click-and-drag).

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.MouseActivityType.Selecting
member.summary: A mouse button was used to select an area.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ScrollBarVisibility
member.summary: Defines visibility options for scroll bars of the viewer.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ScrollBarVisibility.Never
member.summary: Always displayed.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ScrollBarVisibility.Auto
member.summary: Never displayed.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewerException
member.summary: Represents an exception that is raised when an attempt to load, print, or close a PDF document fails.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.InvalidPageNumberException
member.summary: Represents an exception raised by the viewer when an attempt is made to navigate to a non-existent page.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFNotLoadedException
member.summary: Represents an exception raised by the viewer when it finds that no document has been loaded previously for a document-related operation to proceed.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer
member.summary: Represents the PDF viewer component.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PDFViewer control.
member.remarks: This constructor is used by Visual Studio when you drag and drop the viewer control on a form. However, you should modify the auto-generated constructor code and use the other constructor in its place.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PDFViewer control and activates its license with specified key.
member.param: Key with which the license needs to be activated.
member.remarks: You should use this constructor in place of the default constructor that Visual Studio auto-generates when you drag and drop the viewer control on a form.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RefreshView
member.summary: Reloads the PDF document from its source and refresh its display in the viewer.
member.remarks: Use this method to update the display content in response to edits made to the document while it was being displayed.
member.exception: When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.
When what was the "current page" no longer exists in the reloaded document.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.CloseDocument
member.summary: Stops the display of the current document in the viewer and then unloads it from memory.
member.remarks: If the associated PDFDocument was instantiated by the viewer, then it will be disposed automatically. If this is not intended, use method to control the behavior explicitly.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.CloseDocument(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops the display of the current document in the viewer and if specified unloads the PDF document from memory.
member.param: Whether the associated PDFDocument instance needs to be disposed.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from specified path and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: Pathname of the document.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component already displays a document, then it will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the PDF document is password protected, then the viewer will call the event handler. If a handler is not set, then the viewer will attempt to decrypt the document using the value of the property.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from specified path, opens it with specified password, and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: Pathname of the document.
Password with which the document needs to be opened.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component was already displaying a document when this method was called, then this method will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the specified password does not work, then viewer will call the event handler for a maximum of three times. If your code does not provide a correct password in these three attempts, then the specified document will not be displayed.
The value set for the property will NOT be considered by this method.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads the PDFViewer component with the PDF file provided as stream.
member.param: Stream containing the PDF document that needs to be displayed.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component already displays a document, then it will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the PDF document is password protected, then the viewer will call the event handler. If a handler is not set, then the viewer will attempt to decrypt the document using the value of the property.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from specified stream, opens it with specified password, and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: Stream containing the PDF document that needs to be displayed.
The password required to load the document.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component was already displaying a document when this method was called, then this method will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the specified password does not work, then viewer will call the event handler for a maximum of three times. If your code does not provide a correct password in these three attempts, then the specified document will not be displayed.
The value set for the property will NOT be considered by this method.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from specified byte array and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: Byte array containing the PDF document.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component already displays a document, then it will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the PDF document is password protected, then the viewer will call the event handler. If a handler is not set, then the viewer will attempt to decrypt the document using the value of the property.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from specified byte array, opens it with specified password, and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: Byte array containing the PDF document.
Password with which the document needs to be opened.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component was already displaying a document when this method was called, then this method will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the specified password does not work, then viewer will call the event handler for a maximum of three times. If your code does not provide a correct password in these three attempts, then the specified document will not be displayed.
The value set for the property will NOT be considered by this method.
member.exception: When errors where encountered when processing the specified PDF document.
When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(Gnostice.PDFOne.PDFDocument)
member.summary: Loads specified PDF document and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: PDFDocument instance representing the document that needs to be displayed.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component already displays a document, then it will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the PDF document is password protected, then the viewer will call the event handler. If a handler is not set, then the viewer will attempt to decrypt the document using the value of the property.
member.exception: When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LoadDocument(Gnostice.PDFOne.PDFDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Loads specified PDF document, opens it with specified password, and displays it in the viewer.
member.param: PDFDocument instance representing the document that needs to be displayed.
Password with which the document needs to be opened.
member.remarks:
If the viewer component was already displaying a document when this method was called, then this method will automatically first close that document and the display the specified document.
If the specified password does not work, then viewer will call the event handler for a maximum of three times. If your code does not provide a correct password in these three attempts, then the specified document will not be displayed.
The value set for the property will NOT be considered by this method.
member.exception: When a PDF document could not be loaded from the specified source.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.NextPage
member.summary: Makes the viewer display the next page of the document.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PreviousPage
member.summary: Makes the viewer display the previous page of the document.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.FirstPage
member.summary: Makes the viewer display the first page of the document.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.LastPage
member.summary: Makes the viewer display the last page of the document.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.GoToPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Makes the viewer display specified page.
member.param: Number of the page that needs to be displayed.
member.returns: Number of the current page after calling this method.
member.exception: When the number of a non\-existent page is specified.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.GoToPage(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Makes the viewer navigate to the specified position on specified page.
member.param: Number of the page that needs to be displayed.
X\-coordinate of the position on the page where the top\-left corner of the viewer should be placed.
Y\-coordinate of the position on the page where the top\-left corner of the viewer should be placed.
member.returns: Number of the current page after calling this method.
member.remarks: The 'x' and 'y' coordinates are assumed to be based on an origin (0,0) at the top-left corner of the page.
member.exception: When the number of a non\-existent page is specified.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.GoToPage(System.Int32,System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Makes the viewer display specified area on specified page.
member.param: Number of the page that needs to be displayed.
Area on the page that needs to be displayed.
member.returns: Number of the current page after calling this method.
member.remarks: The rectangle coordinates are assumed to be based on an origin (0,0) at the top-left corner of the page.
member.exception: When the number of a non\-existent page is specified.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.ZoomIn
member.summary: Makes the viewer increase the magnification of the displayed page.
member.returns: Returns false if zoom has reached the maximum possible value.
member.remarks: The page magnification is progressively changed through the following values: 1, 5, 10, 25, 50, 75, 100, 150, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 2400, 3200, and 6400

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.ZoomOut
member.summary: Makes the viewer decrease the magnification of the displayed page.
member.returns: Returns false if zoom has reached the minimum possible value.
member.remarks: The page magnification is progressively changed through the following values: 1, 5, 10, 25, 50, 75, 100, 150, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 2400, 3200, and 6400.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RotateView(Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.RotationAngle)
member.summary: Makes the viewer rotate the current page by specified angle.
member.param: Angle of rotation of the page by which the page needs to be rotated.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RotateClockwise90
member.summary: Makes the viewer to rotate the current display of the page by 90 degrees in the clockwise direction.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RotateAntiClockwise90
member.summary: Makes the viewer to rotate the current display of the page by 90 degrees in the counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Scroll
member.summary: Occurs when the document is scrolled in the viewer.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PageClick
member.summary: Occurs when a mouse is clicked on a page displayed in the viewer.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PasswordRequired
member.summary: Occurs when a password is required to display a document.
member.remarks: When a viewer tries to load an encrypted PDF document, it will raise this event. Set PasswordRequiredEventHandler event handler object to either provide a password with which the document can be opened or to abandon the loading of the document.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RenderError
member.summary: Occurs when there are errors during rendering of a particular page of the PDF.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Preferences
member.summary: Gets or sets viewing preferences.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PageMouseActivity
member.summary: Occurs when the viewer receives mouse activity over a displayed PDF page.
member.remarks: Use an event handler to find whether the user clicked a mouse button, moved the mouse pointer, or held the mouse down and selected a rectangular area.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.AfterPDFLoaded
member.summary: Occurs after a PDF has been loaded successfully by the viewer.
member.remarks: This event is internally used by PDFBookmarks component to load the PDF outlines.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PageChanged
member.summary: Occurs when there is a change in the current page displayed by the viewer component.

member.name: E:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the zoom (page magnification) level has changed in the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets color of display area of the viewer that is not occupied by pages of the document.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the image that needs to be used as the background of the display area of the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.BackgroundImageLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout enumeration.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Cursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the image used to display the mouse pointer over the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.BorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the border between the pages of the PDF file.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.InputFileName
member.summary: Gets the input PDF file name that is currently displayed by the PDFViewer control.
member.remarks: Value will be an empty string if the document is loaded from a stream or PDFDocument object.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.CurrentPage
member.summary: Gets the current page being displayed in the PDFViewer.
member.remarks: Set this property to make the viewer display the specified page.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PageBufferCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of buffered pages for the PDF document displayed in the PDFViewer.
member.remarks: This value is used to buffer pages both before and after the currently displaying pages. For example, if the current displaying page is 5 and PageBufferCount is 2, then the pages 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 are held in memory in order to speed up the \navigation between pages.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.TotalPageCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in the currently loaded PDF document.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.KeyNavigationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether keyboard events can be used for navigating pages displayed on the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PDFLoaded
member.summary: Gets whether a document is currently displayed in the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom level with which the viewer displays pages.
member.remarks: When the page magnification is changed, the viewer raises the ZoomChanged event.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.StdZoomType
member.summary: Gets or sets default page magnification with which documents need to be displayed in the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.PageRotationAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets angle of rotation of pages displayed by viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets password for decrypting the current document.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the PDF document that is displayed in the viewer.
member.remarks: Set this property with an existing PDFDocument instance that has already loaded a PDF document. If you set this property, you do not have call the LoadDocument method.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.RenderingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets rendering option for lines, text, and images.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.HScrollBar
member.summary: Gets or sets visibility of the horizontal scroll bar.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.VScrollBar
member.summary: Gets or sets visibility of the vertical scroll bar.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.VScrollValue
member.summary: Gets or sets position of the thumb button on the vertical scroll bar of the viewer.
member.remarks: Set this property to do the scrolling programmatically.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.HScrollValue
member.summary: Gets or sets position of the thumb button on the horizontal scroll bar of the viewer.
member.remarks: Set this property to do the scrolling programmatically.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.VScrollSmallChange
member.summary: Gets distance to which the thumb button needs to move when the end-user clicks on one of the arrow buttons on the vertical scroll bar of the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.HScrollSmallChange
member.summary: Gets distance to which the thumb button needs to move when the end-user clicks on one of the arrow buttons on the horizontal scroll bar of the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.VScrollLargeChange
member.summary: Gets distance to which the thumb button needs to move when the end-user clicks in between the thumb button and the arrow button on the vertical scrollbar of the viewer.

member.name: P:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.PDFViewer.HScrollLargeChange
member.summary: Gets distance to which the thumb button needs to move when the end-user clicks in between the thumb button and the arrow button on the horizontal scrollbar of the viewer.

member.name: T:Gnostice.PDFOne.Windows.PDFViewer.ViewerPreferences
member.summary: Represents viewing preferences for the .
